title: Our COVID-19 Story
description:
Sadie invites her Mom, Korie Robertson and sister, Bella Robertson to discuss their health journey with COIVD-19. Listen in as they share how it impacted them physically and mentally and advice on how to support friends and family who may be wrestling with this illness. Also, be sure to tune in to our next episode, November 11 with Lysa TerKeurst, where she shares her best piece of advice and talks about her upcoming book, Forgiving What You Can't Forget: Discover How to Move On, Make Peace with Painful Memories, and Create a Life That's Beautiful Again. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
